channel.title: Hugo on Explorations ... Go Packages

item.title: Hugo GithubPages Chromebook
item.description: I confess that there is little to like about Google’s Blogger platform. It certainly has not kept pace with offerings like Wordpress or Medium. I suspect that it would suffice for normal text only blogging, but I have a technical blog and getting code snippets to work well is painful.
